Slipgate

Ability

Active Repel

General
Faction: Vecgir
Footprint: 12x12 hexagonal


The Slipgate is the Vecgir all-in-one Teleporter and Chronoporter. It can also teleport enemies away once Autodefence is researched.

Abilities

Teleport / Chronoport

The Slipgate allows any nearby Vecgir units to teleport and chronoport. Vecgir units upgraded to skip-teleport will use the Slipgate to teleport if possible.

Active Repel

The Slipgate will actively teleport away nearby enemies in this mode. Autodefence must be researched before Active Repel can be used. It doesn't affect cloaked units even if there is a nearby detector.
